platform_postcodes.h File Reference

Post codes - Analog Devices platform specific. More...

#include "utils/generic/generic.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

Macros

#define BOOT_STAGE_OFFSET   28
 
#define PLAT_OFFSET   24
 
#define HW_BLOCK_OFFSET   16
 
#define HSP_BOOT_STAGE_0SP   (0 << BOOT_STAGE_OFFSET)
 
#define HSP_BOOT_STAGE_1SP   (1 << BOOT_STAGE_OFFSET)
 
#define HSP_BOOT_STAGE_2SP   (2 << BOOT_STAGE_OFFSET)
 
#define ANALOG_DEVICES_PLAT   (1 << PLAT_OFFSET)
 
#define HSP_PLATFORM   ANALOG_DEVICES_PLAT
 
#define HW_GENERIC   (1 << HW_BLOCK_OFFSET)
 
#define HW_FUSE_CTRL   (2 << HW_BLOCK_OFFSET)
 
#define HW_CRYPTO   (3 << HW_BLOCK_OFFSET)
 
#define HW_MBOX   (4 << HW_BLOCK_OFFSET)
 
#define HW_PMP   (5 << HW_BLOCK_OFFSET)
 
#define HW_VENDOR_HW   (6 << HW_BLOCK_OFFSET)
 

Enumerations

 Post code values. More...
 

Detailed Description

Post codes - Analog Devices platform specific.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum Hsp_post_code_t

Post code values.

Enumerator
HW_INIT_DONE 

HW initializing

CRITICAL_ERR 

Critical Error

HALT 

System halt

RUN_RESET 

Resetting system

RUN_TEST_STATE 

HSP in Test state flow

RUN_RECOVERY 

Running recovery

NO_RECOVERY 

Unable to recover

JUMP_TO_1SP 

Jumping to 1SP

RUN_PROD_STATE 

HSP in Production state flow

RUN_SECURED_STATE 

HSP in Secured state flow

SET_OPERATING_MODE 

Setting operating mode of HSP

PLL_BIT_SET 

PLL register bit[10] is set

WAIT_FCTRL_DONE 

Waiting for FCTRL to be done

SECURITY_STATE_READ 

Read Security State

CRYPTO_HW_INIT_DONE 

Done initializing crypto hardware

CRYPTO_INITIALIZE_CRYPTO_KEYS_DONE 

Initializing Crypto Keys complete

CRYPTO_RNG_WAIT_START 

Starting wait for RNG initialization to complete

CRYPTO_RNG_WAIT_DONE 

Done waiting for RNG initialization to complete

MBX_LOOP_ENTERED 

Mailbox loop entered

MBX_H2S_SET_ERR_BIT 

Mailbox set h2s error bit

MBX_WFI_MODE_ENTERED 

Mailbox in WFI mode

MBX_GET_MBX_CMD 

Getting Mailbox Cmd Header

MBX_GET_MBX_ERROR_LOG_CMD 

Getting Mailbox Cmd Header inside error loop

MBX_PROCCESS_SEQ_LOOKUP 

Processing Mailbox Lookup Sequence

MBX_CHECK_MBX_PKT 

Validating Mailbox Cmd Header

MBX_VALIDATE_MBX_ATTR 

Validate Mailbox Cmd Attributes

MBX_PROCESS_CMD 

Processing Mailbox Cmd; Entering Cmd handling switch case

MBX_CMD_OPERATING_MODE 

Processing Mailbox Operating Mode Cmd

MBX_CMD_GROUPED_DATA 

Processing Mailbox Grouped Data Cmd

MBX_CMD_RAM_DATA 

Processing Mailbox Ram Data Cmd

MBX_CMD_REG_CFG_DATA 

Processing Mailbox Reg Cfg Cmd

MBX_CMD_1SP_IMAGE 

Processing Mailbox 1SP Image Cmd

MBX_CMD_SIGNATURE 

Processing Mailbox Signature Cmd

MBX_CMD_PUB_KEY 

Processing Mailbox Public Key Cmd

MBX_CMD_INVALID 

Mailbox Cmd Invalid

MBX_AUTH_PUB_KEY 

Mailbox Authenticating Public Keys

MBX_GROUPED_PAYLOAD_POST_PROCESS 

Grouped Payload Post Processing

MBX_INDIVIDUAL_PAYLOAD_POST_PROCESS 

Individual Payload Post Processing

MBX_SIGN_VERIF_FAIL 

Mailbox Signature Verification Fail

MBX_SIGN_VERIF_PASS 

Mailbox Signature Verification Pass

MBX_RECEIVED_SIG 

Mailbox Received Signature

Mailbox Received Signed 1SP

Mailbox Post Processing Complete

MBX_SHA_GROUPED_START_NEW 

Mailbox SHA start new for grouped payload

MBX_SHA_GROUPED_WAIT_COMPLETE 

Mailbox SHA wait complete for grouped payload

MBX_SHA_INDIV_START_NEW 

Mailbox SHA start new for individual payload

MBX_SHA_INDIV_WAIT_COMPLETE 

Mailbox SHA wait complete for individual payload

MBX_ERROR_LOOP 

Entered Mailbox Error loop

Decrypting Generic 1SP

Decrypting MSFT 1SP

Vendor HW read decryption keys from fuses

Vendor HW init done

Vendor Authorize Public Keys SHA wait completed

VENDOR_AUTH_PUB_KEYS_DONE 

Vendor Authorize Public Keys done
